UnitDefinition.Name: Covariate model types
UnitDefinition.Description: Accepted Covariate model types. Controlled terminology.

Unit.Name: Only constant
Unit.Description: No relation between exposure and e.g. age or gender.

Unit.Name: Only covariable
Unit.Description: Exposure depends on the covariable, e.g. age.

Unit.Name: Only cofactor
Unit.Description: Exposure depends on the level of the cofactor, e.g. gender.

Unit.Name: Both covariable and cofactor
Unit.Description: Exposure depends on both covariable and cofactor (additive model).

Unit.Name: Both covariable and cofactor and interaction
Unit.Description: Exposure depends on both covariable and cofactor and the effect of the covariable differs for different levels of the cofactor (multiplicative model).
